description: {*Loose pebbles scatter beneath your feet, and clouds of dust reach up to
embrace your lungs.  The walls stretch endlessly in all directions, marred
with the occasional cleft, created during some long-forgotten conflict.
Light is devoured by the dark of the caves around you.  {0
17028.name: {3Among the Twisting Corridors{0

description: {*The reassuring light from outside is not so prevailent here, and more
dark than light now shrouds you.  The rock draws you inward with
fl{&I{*ck{&e{*rs of light deeper within.  You shudder as you continue on
your path.  {0
17001.name: {3An Opening in a Dark Cave{0

description: {*Continuing your journey, you stumble briefly.  Cursing aloud, you
suddenly fall silent.  The rumbling noise that has been your companion has
fallen silent.  Worried, you pause where you stand, but the noise resumes in
its now familiar rumbling crescendos.  Some great beast sleeps nearby, but
where?  In this dreary hole, it could be anywhere.  {0
17014.name: {3A Chamber Among the Corridors{0

description: {*The cave here is enveloped in darkness, unpenetrated by any glimmer of
the world you once knew outside.  Every direction is full of the same gloom
that you have followed these many turns and twists.  A faint
{6draft {*caresses your skin briefly, and vanishes in a whisp of memory.  {0
17020.name: {3A Chamber Among the Corridors{0

description: {*Your travel is paced by the echoing snores, but your mind is clouded by
the wearying course.  Anger swells up in your chest, only to be crushed
swiftly by a reminder of where you are.  In these tight walls is barely room
to swing a sword or cast a spell.  Whatever lurks here holds the advantage,
and you must be wary.  {0
17025.name: {3Beneath a Cliff{0

description: {*Already dark, this fold of the cavern is blacker still.  Neither light
nor cheer have any welcome here.  {0
17003.name: {3Beneath a Stone Shelf{0

description: {*The tunnel here twists upon itself.  You wonder if this is the way you
mean to go, or if the caves have somehow unnaturally moved your feet in a
new direction.  You glance about, but catch sight of no clues to aid your
decision.  {0
17023.name: {3Among the Winding Corridors{0

description: {*You scale this dangerous stone wall in almost total darkness.  The
handholds are old and loose, and pieces of earth crumble away beneath your
fumbling fingers.  {0
17013.name: {3Scaling a Vertical Wall{0

description: {*Loose pebbles scatter beneath your feet, and clouds of dust reach up to
embrace your lungs.  The walls stretch endlessly in all directions, marred
with the occasional cleft, created during some long-forgotten conflict.
Light is devoured by the dark of the caves around you.  {0
17006.name: {3The Edge of a Steep Precipe{0

description: {*The roof slopes downward, forcing you to walk slightly hunched over.
Already weary of the monotony, this effort is an annoyance, but perhaps a
deadly one.  The hammerwork sounds closer now, but the twists and turns of
the cavern prevent anyone from finding the origination of the ominous
sounds.  {0
17008.name: {3At the Bottom of a Dangerous Drop{0

description: {*The tunnel here twists upon itself.  You wonder if this is the way you
mean to go, or if the caves have somehow unnaturally moved your feet in a
new direction.  You glance about, but catch sight of no clues to aid your
decision.  {0
17011.name: {3A Curve in the Tunnels of the Cave{0

description: {*Continuing your journey, you stumble briefly.  Cursing aloud, you
suddenly fall silent.  The rumbling noise that has been your companion has
fallen silent.  Worried, you pause where you stand, but the noise resumes in
its now familiar rumbling crescendos.  Some great beast sleeps nearby, but
where?  In this dreary hole, it could be anywhere.  {0
17022.name: {3A Deceptive Curve in the Caverns{0

description: {*A small hole is here, unremarkable except for its inconspicuocy in
these otherwise conformist halls.  It contains nothing but a brittle,
{xwhite{* powder, but its presence is somehow disturbing.  From somewhere
far in the distance, or perhaps close by, a hammer-stroke reverberates
throughout the caverns, indicating at last that you are not alone, and
perhaps, not unnoticed.  {0
{*You continue journeying these deep depth.  Why did you come here?  What
reward did you seek?  Who promised it?  The questions remain unanswered in
your mind.  That you do not recall these details is disturbing.  {0
17031.name: {3Among the Twisting Caverns{0

description: {*The stone here breaks the unending darkness with a {#glimmer{* of some
ore, but in these dark dwellings, even the greediest dwarf would continue on
his way.  The very air about you is threatening, and breathing is becoming
more difficult.  The sounds of hammers have faded now, to be replaced by
some worse, unidentifiable sound.  Worse because you dont know what it is.
17010.name: {3A Curve in the Tunnels of the Cave{0

description: {*Miserable dark, uncompassionate stone walls.  You grow weary of the
unending boredom of it all.  A vast desert of nothingness, these caves hold
nothing of the splendor that dwarves create with their magnificent tools.
Crude and simple, these are mockeries of subterranean glamour.  {0
17029.name: {3Scaling a Stone Cliff{0

description: {*Stumbling feet continue along dull, barren stone.  Oppressive darkness
swells up around you, and the walls are shaking slightly from the rumble of
the unknown gargantuan.  How long has his slumber disturbed these aging
rocks?  {0
17026.name: {3A Narrow Curve in the Tunnels{0

description: {*You walk onward in the dark.  The walls seem to travel with you, so
little do their features change.  One step is much like the countless steps
before it, bringing you to some end not yet seen.  {0
17033.name: {3A Curve in the Cavern{0

description: {*As you continue on your way, the floor under you narrows as the wall
drops away, leaving you travelling along a dangerous precipice, with neither
a floor nor ceiling in sight, you shy away from that course, something there
does not wish to be disturbed, and you are happy to oblige whatever it may
be.  {0
17040.name: {3Among the Twisting Caverns{0

description: {2The branches of nearby trees reach and grope towards you, their
branches hanging low in the season.  To your east is a large, gaping
cave, entrenched in shadows, while to the west drapes you deeper into
the forest.  Few tracks or footsteps lie in the vicinity of the
cavern, and even fewer come from the cave itself.  {0
17000.name: {3In the {2Forest{3 Before a {*Dark Cavern{0

description: {*Taking pains, you attempt to dull your hearing.  The noise emitted from
that unseen mouth is almost painful now.  The walls are vibrating with a
disturbing ferociousness.  Your take comfort only in the age of them, surely
they have endured this tribulation long, and shall for some time continue to
do as such.  {0
17032.name: {3Among the Twisting Caverns{0

description: {*The floor spits up its long held dust as your feet disturb its resting
surface, its hostility running alongside your feet with each hateful step.
17039.name: {3Among the Twisting Caverns{0

description: {*More rock.  The walls and stone gracefully run out of your way,
climbing and folding upon itself as you travel along their course.  Enticing
you with their exotic lure, you are relieved to realize that the rumbling
now echos from far away, and the world around you sits still again.  {0
17038.name: {3Among the Twisting Caverns{0

description: {*The rocks beneath your feet seem to be moving of their own accord,
fleeing from the shaking floor and seeking to escape some unknown fate.  {0
17030.name: {#Beneath a Stone Shelf{0

description: {*You scale this dangerous stone wall in almost total darkness.  The
handholds are old and loose, and pieces of earth crumble away beneath your
fumbling fingers.  {0 {* Beneath you the ledge drops precariously far, and
enters an enormous natural cavern.  The rumbling is now louder than ever.
There are only two choices before you, which will you take?  {0
17043.name: {#Scaling a Granite Wall{0

description: {*The rock here pivots about you, echoing some ancient sentiments
perhaps, but the ritualistic beauty eludes you.  Answers are what you seek
now, and you continue along your journey, leaving the scorned reminders
behind.  {0
17036.name: {3Among the Twisting Caverns{0

description: {*Your travel is paced by the echoing snores, but your mind is clouded by
the wearying course.  Anger swells up in your chest, only to be crushed
swiftly by a reminder of where you are.  In these tight walls is barely room
to swing a sword or cast a spell.  Whatever lurks here holds the advantage,
and you must be wary.  {0
17018.name: {3Atop a Stone Shelf{0

description: {*The stone wall turns sharply, and your feet follow its journey of their
own accord.  The monotony in itself is almost lethal.  You feel your muscles
and senses dulling with each step.  {0
17016.name: {3Among the Twisting Caverns{0

description: {*The cavern narrows about you, just a formation of the earth, but you
nonetheless feel as if it is attempting to clench you in its grasp.  You
step your pace slightly, and continue quickly on your way.  {0
17017.name: {3Among the Twisting Caverns{0

description: {*The cavern twists and turns, and not far from here is total darkness.
You can travel into that darkness or back to the comforting embrace of the
light outside.  Having made your decision, you go on your way.  { 0
17002.name: {3Deeper Into the Cave{0

description: {*The tunnel turns here, and you have little choice but to continue with
it.  The consolation that the journey has not needed your course to branch
off is briefly reassuring.  However, the creatures supreme undeniable
confidence is eerily disturbing.  {0
17027.name: {3Among the Twisting Corridors{0

description: {*Miserable dark, uncompassionate stone walls.  You grow weary of the
unending boredom of it all.  A vast desert of nothingness, these caves hold
nothing of the splendor that dwarves create with their magnificent tools.
Crude and simple, these are mockeries of subterranean glamour.  {0
17005.name: {3The Edge of a Steep Precipe{0

description: {*Loose pebbles scatter beneath your feet, and clouds of dust reach up to
embrace your lungs.  The walls stretch endlessly in all directions, marred
with the occasional cleft, created during some long-forgotten conflict.
Light is devoured by the dark of the caves around you.  {0
17021.name: {3Among the Twisting Caverns{0

description: {*Walls close in on you, scraping your shoulders, and making the tedious
travel notably slower.  Inching forward, you realize the ground beneath your
feet is not solid, as a small piece of earth breaks away and plummets to
some unknowable depth and fate.  Looking upwards, you continue on your way.
17009.name: {3A Curve in the Tunnels of the Cave{0

description: {*This far end of a great cavern encompasses your sight in a huge
semicircular form.  The stone here is roughly hewn, and scattered remains
litter the scenery before you.  In a corner draped in darkness you see a
small gateway, covered with an ancient iron portculis.  {0
17045.name: {3A Rough Stone Cavern{0

description: {*The precipice has ended, and once again you are enclosed on all sides
by the gloom and dark stone.  With a bitter thought, you realize that you
had missed their presence.  Damn this place!  You shall be glad indeed to be
rid of it for good or ill.  {0
17041.name: {3At the Edge of a Long Fall{0

description: {*Walls close in on you, scraping your shoulders, and making the tedious
travel notably slower.  Inching forward, you realize the ground beneath your
feet is not solid, as a small piece of earth breaks away and plummets to
some unknowable depth and fate.  Looking upwards, you continue on your way.
17015.name: {3Among the Twisting Caverns{0

description: {*You come to a stop.  Here at last is something to break the mind
dulling quest.  The wall here is carven with some ancient inscription.  Its
language long forgotten by the world, its message tragically has been lost
with it.  What hand seeked to tell the world some important thought?  Did he
bid travellers return, or perhaps it is a plea for help?  You ponder the
possibilities as you continue along the road set before you.  {0
17037.name: {3A Dark Cavern{0

description: {*This hell continues unremarkably.  Nothing but that damnable noise.
The occasional scuttering sounds of some insect reach your ears, but you see
nothing.  The darkness is drawing away your hope, making every step a
strain.  {0
17012.name: {3Above a Precipe{0

description: {*The cave here is enveloped in darkness, unpenetrated by any glimmer of
the world you once knew outside.  Every direction is full of the same gloom
that you have followed these many turns and twists.  A faint
{6draft{*caresses your skin briefly, and vanishes in a whisp of memory.  {0
17004.name: {3Beneath a Stone Shelf{0

description: {*You stand at the foot of a great stone face.  All around you are
towering stone walls, climbing to the heights above you.  The unscalable
wall lies westward, while a deep rumbling noise comes from the east.  {0
17044.name: {3Beneath an Enormous Ledge{0

description: {*The cavern narrows about you, just a formation of the earth, but you
nonetheless feel as if it is attempting to clench you in its grasp.  You
step your pace slightly, and continue quickly on your way.  {0
17024.name: {3Scaling a Section of the Caverns{0

description: {*You scale this dangerous stone wall in almost total darkness.  The
handholds are old and loose, and pieces of earth crumble away beneath your
fumbling fingers.  {0
17019.name: {3Scaling an Earthen Cliff{0

description: {*More stones, soil and darkness.  You are almost entranced by the
repetitive nature of the earthen world about you.  {0
17042.name: {#Scaling a Granite Wall{0

description: {*Still unchanged, you continue on your path amidst the stone rabble.  A
small fissure in the wall brings with it some ancient wind to blow across
your face.  How long since that sour air soared above with the eagles in the
{7clouds{*?  What secrets does its tragic journey reveal that you yourself
seek to find?  With a final brush, the breeze dies out again, searching for
its own freedom.  {0
17035.name: {3A Fissure in the Wall{0

description: {*Small pebbles and rocks are falling from the ceiling overhead, and a
faint hammering sound has resumed its beat.  Should you be comforted by the
resumption of the hammers?  The unanswered question sits in your mind as you
continue on your path.  {0
17034.name: {3A Dark, Twisting Cavern{0

description:
{*These bull headed creatures wander the endless realms of their
subterranean mazes, searching for something lost to their people for
countless ages.  {0
17000.room_name: {&A tall, bull headed creature stands here, shouldering a hefty axe.{0
17000.name: {&An {1angry{& minotaur{0~
17000.keywords: tall bull headed creature angry minotaur~

17001.name: {*A D{&ue{*rgar Dw{&a{*rf{0~
17001.keywords: short encloaked figure duergar dark dwarf~

description:
This unspeakably huge creatures great teeth drip with eager juices, and
its eyes gleam with a feral, unquenchable hunger.  Savage while slumbering,
this gargantuan is even more vile while awake.  Consuming everything in its
path merely for the sake of an insatiable appetite, it resembles nothing you
have ever seen.  Part dragon perhaps, its rippling fleshy body is covered
with a dark, rusty color.  An odor that defies words surround it, and its
claws are larger by far than the largest sword wielded by any hero.
17002.name: {*The mighty Tarrasque{0~
